item.title: Dove encourages women to push boundaries and redefine beauty and success
item.description:
Women are rejecting the idea that their appearance should limit their potential, sharing empowering stories in Dove’s new film, #MyBeautyMySay. The film aims to motivate women to defy stereotypes and societal expectations. Dove’s Global Beauty Confidence Report reveals that women desire the freedom to express themselves authentically but feel restricted by judgments about their appearance. For example, 70% of women receive more compliments on their looks than their work achievements...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dove-encourages-women-to-push-boundaries-and-redefine-beauty-and-success/

item.title: Dell updates tablets, unveils new 5K monitor and smart desk
item.description:
Dell has improved its PC selection to boost productivity with new tablet functionalities, a 5K Ultra HD monitor, and a futuristic “smart desk” workspace. Jeff Clarke, Dell’s Vice Chairman of Operations and President of Client Solutions, highlighted Dell’s focus on improving productivity and business outcomes at the recent Dell World Executive Summit. The Dell UltraSharp 27 Monitor, available in December for US$2,499, offers Ultra HD 5K resolution (5,120 x 2,880), seven times sharper than Full HD...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dell-updates-tablets-unveils-new-5k-monitor-and-smart-desk/
